comments:
I am using build ID I200406101200. This is a reproducible bug on that build.
This does not happen with build ID I20040609800.

Steps:
- Import "org.eclipse.ui.ide" as source
- Switch to the Java perspective
- Open 4 java files
- Restart eclipse
- Hit "Ctrl+M" to maximize an editor
- Hit "Ctrl+F6" and let go to switch to another editor

You will find the following in the log file:

I'm not seeing this in HEAD.  It's possible that the fix entered for 63721 has
fixed it... we'll wait until the next build to confirm

So it turns out this has nothing to do with editor switching. See test suite
results for more information (I20040610).

This is the one Nick fixed for 20040610-1700. This is a good test case to 
verify.

I haven't been able to reproduce this on I200406110010. Looks like it's fixed.
Marking it as such.
